wmndsContentCardProps.name: id
wmndsContentCardProps.description: The id of the content card

wmndsContentCardProps.name: link
wmndsContentCardProps.description: Specifies the link to display the content card component as a clickable navigation card.

wmndsContentCardProps.name: linkTitle
wmndsContentCardProps.description: Specifies the title of the link to display the content card component as a clickable navigation card.

wmndsContentCardProps.name: classes
wmndsContentCardProps.description: Classes to add to the content card component.

wmndsContentCardProps.name: yellow
wmndsContentCardProps.description: Displays the content card with a highlighted (yellow) background. Default value is false
